sn25:1.0.1_0: The Linked Discourses on the going forth,
sn25:1.1.10_0: mind until you’ve realized the fruit of stream-entry.
sn25:1.1.2_0: “Mendicants, the eye is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:1.1.3_0: The ear is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:1.1.4_0: The nose is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:1.1.6_0: The body is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:1.1.7_0: The mind is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:1.1.8_0: Someone who has faith and confidence in these principles is called a follower by faith. They’ve arrived at inevitability regarding the right path, they’ve arrived at the level of the good person, and they’ve transcended the level of the bad person.
sn25:1.2.1_0: Someone who has faith and confidence in these things is said to complain:
sn25:1.2.1_1: ‘Even if he has arrived at the level of the good person, they’ve arrived at the level of the good person, and they’ve transcended the level of the bad person.
sn25:1.2.3_0: From time to time you can’t realize the fruit of stream-entry.”
sn25:1.2.4_0: Someone who understands and sees these things is called
sn25:1.2.4_1: ‘A stream-enterer is a stream-enterer, not liable to be reborn in the underworld, bound for awakening.’”
sn25:1.2.5_0: First the first part of the body.
sn25:10.0.1_0: The Linked Discourses on the going forth,
sn25:10.0.2_0: for the sake of seeing the eye.
sn25:10.1.2_0: “Mendicants, form is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:10.1.3_0: and feeling are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:10.1.5_0: Choices are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:10.1.6_0: and consciousness are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:10.1.7_0: Someone who has faith and confidence in these principles is called a follower by faith. They’ve arrived at inevitability regarding the right path, they’ve arrived at the level of the good person, and they’ve transcended the level of the bad person.
sn25:10.1.9_0: mind until you’ve realized the fruit of stream-entry.
sn25:10.2.1_0: Someone who has faith and confidence in these things is said to complain:
sn25:10.2.1_1: ‘Even if he has arrived at the level of the good person, they’ve arrived at the level of the good person, and they’ve transcended the level of the bad person.
sn25:10.2.3_0: From time to time you can’t realize the fruit of stream-entry.”
sn25:10.2.4_0: Someone who understands and sees these things is called
sn25:10.2.5_0: ‘A stream-enterer is a stream-enterer, not liable to be reborn in the underworld, bound for awakening.’”
sn25:10.2.7_0: The first sub-chapter on the eye is finished.
sn25:10.3.5_0: The Linked Discourses on arrival are complete.
sn25:2.0.1_0: The Linked Discourses on the going forth,
sn25:2.0.2_0: for the sake of seeing the eye.
sn25:2.1.10_0: mind until you’ve realized the fruit of stream-entry.
sn25:2.1.2_0: “Mendicants, sights are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:2.1.3_0: and sounds are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:2.1.4_0: Smells are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:2.1.5_0: and tastes are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:2.1.6_0: and touches are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:2.1.7_0: and thoughts are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:2.1.8_0: Someone who has faith and confidence in these principles is called a follower by faith. They’ve arrived at inevitability regarding the right path, they’ve arrived at the level of the good person, and they’ve transcended the level of the bad person.
sn25:2.2.1_0: Someone who has faith and confidence in these things is said to complain:
sn25:2.2.1_1: ‘Even if he has arrived at the level of the good person, they’ve arrived at the level of the good person, and they’ve transcended the level of the bad person.
sn25:2.2.3_0: From time to time you can’t realize the fruit of stream-entry.”
sn25:2.2.4_0: Someone who understands and sees these things is called
sn25:2.2.5_0: ‘A stream-enterer is a stream-enterer, not liable to be reborn in the underworld, bound for awakening.’”
sn25:3.0.1_0: The Linked Discourses on the going forth,
sn25:3.0.2_0: for the sake of seeing the eye.
sn25:3.1.2_0: “Mendicants, eye consciousness is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:3.1.7_0: Mind consciousness is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:3.1.8_0: Someone who has faith and confidence in these principles is called a follower by faith. ...”
sn25:4.0.1_0: The Linked Discourses on the going forth,
sn25:4.0.2_0: for the sake of seeing the eye.
sn25:4.1.2_0: “Mendicants, eye contact is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:4.1.7_0: and mind contact are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:4.1.8_0: Someone who brings these things is called a follower of the teachings. ...”
sn25:5.0.1_0: The Linked Discourses on the going forth,
sn25:5.0.2_0: for the sake of seeing the eye.
sn25:5.1.2_0: “Mendicants, feeling born of eye contact is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:5.1.7_0: and feeling born of mind contact are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:5.1.8_0: Someone who brings these things is called a follower of the teachings. ...”
sn25:6.0.1_0: The Linked Discourses on the going forth,
sn25:6.0.2_0: for the sake of seeing the eye.
sn25:6.1.2_0: “Mendicants, perception of sights is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:6.1.7_0: and perception of thoughts are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:6.1.8_0: Someone who brings these things is called a follower of the teachings. ...”
sn25:7.0.1_0: The Linked Discourses on the going forth,
sn25:7.0.2_0: for the sake of seeing the eye.
sn25:7.1.2_0: “Mendicants, intention regarding sights is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:7.1.7_0: and intentions regarding thoughts are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:7.1.8_0: Someone who brings these things is called a follower of the teachings. ...”
sn25:8.0.1_0: The Linked Discourses on the going forth,
sn25:8.0.2_0: for the sake of seeing the eye.
sn25:8.1.2_0: “Mendicants, craving for sights is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:8.1.7_0: and craving for thoughts are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:8.1.8_0: Someone who brings these things is called a follower of the teachings. ...”
sn25:9.0.1_0: The Linked Discourses on the going forth,
sn25:9.1.2_0: “Mendicants, the earth element is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:9.1.7_0: and the consciousness element are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn25:9.1.8_0: Someone who brings these things is called a follower of the teachings. ...”
